CustomField.description: Use this option to change the answer element style of survey responder interface. Use standard CSS style. e.g. color: #445566;font-size: 20px.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Answer Element Style allows you to customize the style of the answer elements in the survey responder interface. You can use standard CSS styles. e.g. color: #445566;font-size: 20px.
CustomField.label: Answer Element Style
